fields.name: Drum Sessions Vol. 1
fields.description: A smooth collection of drum loops, with BPM's ranging from 74.00 to 124.00. Use to flavour your tracks with a live feel.

fields.name: Drum Sessions Vol. 2
fields.description: A smooth collection of drum loops, with BPM's ranging from 74.00 to 124.00. Use these to flavour your tracks with a live feel.

fields.name: Colossus Filters
fields.description: Embed this throughout your tracks to create massive atmospheres using Colossus Filters' ambient sounds

fields.name: Django Guitar Loops
fields.description: Soulful studio recordings of electric guitar riffs, written to bring life to any track that utilises them. Speed them up, slow them down, or cut them as desired, these loops are guaranteed to impress.

fields.name: Grooves
fields.description: Experience these hard hitting bass lines that can be used to give your track that missing element to take it to the next level.

fields.name: Impact Kicks
fields.description: kick away the competitors with this new pack. containing over 100 one-shots of kick drums, this pack will bring your project to the fore-front with hard-hitting drums.

fields.name: essential organs
fields.description: after listening to the first track of this new pack, you're going to want to flavour every new project with these organ soundbites. recorded in a studio, and then mastered to emphasize every note, essential organs contains 12 new tracks ready for you to unleash.

fields.name: Snare For Days
fields.description: as the name implies, one listen and you will be snared in the crisp sounds provided this multi-pack. a pack that contains a combination of one-shots and loops. Feel free to use these to create the perfect foundation for your next project.

fields.name: Snare For Days
fields.description: subtle but powerful. That is what this new pack offers anyone who unlocks this pack. with a lot of room to breathe, any aspiring producer can take their project to the next level.

fields.name: The Real Reggae
fields.description: everyone loves reggae. and everyone will love this reggae pack. get it now to influence your projects with that smooth sound of reggae.

fields.name: Bon Vox
fields.description: a multi pack of beautiful, soulful vocal recordings that will certainly get the crowd moving their feet to your tracks. unleash the strong vocal powers of singer/musician Zo√© playoust.

fields.name: Atmospheric Sounds
fields.description: explore the immense world with this extensive atmsopheric sounds. These will expand the audiosphere of your project.
